title: Grow Up Healthy: Children’s Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Fufu, ufufufu....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....What are you laughing at?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, I’m sorry. I wasn’t laughing at you because you were making a weird face or anything, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Oooooooobviously! There’s no way the number one idol in the universe, Nico, would ever make a weird face! So, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Umm, I just thought it was cute that you were eating Kashiwa mochi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haah?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Kashiwa mochi are made with the hope that whoever eats them will grow up healthy, right? That’s why I thought because you’re eating one, it’ll be nice if you could always stay healthy and continue to be a school idol with me forever, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>So you weren’t thinking that I looked just like a child when eating this, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? Sorry, I didn’t quite hear that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s nothing. More importantly, you should go eat some too, Hanayo. You want to keep being an idol with me, right? Come on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
